title: UFC Fight Night: Santos vs. Walker
description: UFC Fight Night: Santos vs. Walker (also known as UFC Fight Night 193, UFC Vegas 38 and UFC on ESPN+ 51) is an ongoing mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship taking place on October 2, 2021 at the UFC Apex facility in Enterprise, Nevada, part of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Area, United States.
location: UFC Fight Night: Santos vs. Walker
